b'@MaisaCorp $ICPT Focus on PBC, growing 30% a year. Ditch the 350 million NASH burn and the stock heads to 75.  Only a foolish team looks at what happening and decides to destroy the company following the NASH dream. Pruzansky thought NASH Was a hot blonde.  She wasn\xe2\x80\x99t, hot or blonde. Chunky'

b'@MaisaCorp $ICPT. Seriously, has anyone ever met anyone w NASH?  Just lose weight and u recover. It\xe2\x80\x99s a fake, hyped, alleged market. It has wasted more biotech dollars than Alzheimer\xe2\x80\x99s.  New ceo needs to focus on PBC. Could generate 500 million in 2 years.That alone, without NASH burn rate'

b'@MaisaCorp $ICPT.  Amazing how price targets went from 350 average down to 40.   If they stay the course, w NASH, they will be gone in 15 months.  Market cap decimation did not deter Pruzansky.  He made is hundreds of millions. A new CEO will toss this unneeded drug.'

b'@MaisaCorp $ICPT For shareholders suffering thru a 4 year downtrend, tmrw is the bottom.  Tax selling is exasperating.  The loss of the CEO is the first step to dismantling NASH.  Maybe they give it 6 more months. But if any negative FDA stuff happens, the program will be ditched. Gonzo'
